name: ABC Publisher
shortDescription: ABC is dedicated to bringing stories to life, empowering authors, and inspiring readers worldwide. We specialize in publishing engaging, high-quality books across genres.
longDescription: A classic tale of life and struggles in a fishing village along the Padma River, capturing the essence of rural Bengal.

name: BoiBichitra Publications
tagLine: Exploring Literature, One Book at a Time
shortDescription: BoiBichitra Publications is a leading name in Bangladeshi literature, publishing books that cater to readers of all ages and backgrounds.
longDescription: Our publications cover a diverse range of genres, ensuring quality storytelling and educational content for all.

name: NoboPoth Publications
shortDescription: NoboPoth Publications strives to introduce fresh perspectives and new authors to Bangladeshi readers.
longDescription: Our mission is to inspire curiosity and knowledge through books that push creative boundaries.

name: OnnoRokom Publications
shortDescription: OnnoRokom Publications is known for its thought-provoking books that encourage critical thinking and innovation.
longDescription: We publish a wide array of books, from science fiction to social studies, always aiming to provide new insights.

name: Prothoma Prokashoni
tagLine: Preserving Culture, One Book at a Time
shortDescription: Prothoma Prokashoni is committed to preserving and promoting Bangladeshi culture through books that reflect our heritage.
longDescription: Our publications focus on history, literature, and the arts, aiming to keep traditions alive for future generations.

name: Sheba Prokashoni
tagLine: Adventure and Knowledge in Every Page
shortDescription: Sheba Prokashoni is Bangladeshâ€™s most beloved publisher of detective stories, adventures, and children's literature.
longDescription: Our books have captivated generations, from Masud Rana thrillers to timeless fairy tales.

name: Anannya Publications
shortDescription: Anannya Publications focuses on empowering readers through literature that highlights important social issues.
longDescription: Our books cover women's empowerment, education, and literature that challenges societal norms.

name: Tamrolipi Publications
shortDescription: Tamrolipi Publications bridges the gap between classic and contemporary literature, catering to all readers.
longDescription: We focus on both timeless classics and modern literature, creating a unique reading experience.

name: Pathak Shamabesh
shortDescription: Pathak Shamabesh is dedicated to fostering a strong reading culture in Bangladesh through quality literature.
longDescription: We curate a selection of books that include literary fiction, educational content, and translated works.

name: Bangla Academy Publications
shortDescription: Bangla Academy Publications is the most authoritative publisher in Bangladesh, dedicated to linguistic and literary research.
longDescription: We publish academic research, literary masterpieces, and government-approved textbooks to promote Bangla literature and culture.
